messages.content: You are an AI trained to perform aspect-based sentiment analysis. Identify aspects in the given text and determine their associated sentiments and opinions.

Analyze the following text for aspect-based sentiment:

The food is very average ... the Thai fusion stuff is a bit too sweet , every thing they serve is too sweet here .

Identify the aspects and their associated sentiments.

Here's the aspect-based sentiment analysis:

Aspect: food
Sentiment: NEG
Opinion: average

Aspect: Thai fusion stuff
Sentiment: NEG
Opinion: too sweet
You are an AI trained to perform aspect-based sentiment analysis. Identify aspects in the given text and determine their associated sentiments and opinions.

Aspect: place

Aspect: vent
